statements: SELECT * FROM member_contributions
SELECT member_id, contribution_amount, contribution_date FROM member_contributions WHERE member_id = 1
SELECT contribution_amount, contribution_date FROM member_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM member_contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC
SELECT AVG(contribution_amount) AS average_contribution FROM member_contributions
SELECT * FROM member_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000 ORDER BY contribution_date ASC
SELECT member_id, contribution_amount FROM member_contributions WHERE member_id = 2
SELECT contribution_date, contribution_amount FROM member_contributions WHERE contribution_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY contribution_date DESC
SELECT member_id, contribution_amount, contribution_date FROM member_contributions ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC, contribution_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM member_contributions WHERE member_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM member_contributions WHERE member_id = 1
SELECT contribution_amount, contribution_date FROM member_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM member_contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC
SELECT AVG(contribution_amount) AS avg_contribution FROM member_contributions
SELECT member_id, SUM(profit_amount) AS total_profit FROM profit_distribution GROUP BY member_id
SELECT member_id, contribution_amount, contribution_date FROM member_contributions WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM member_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000;
SELECT member_id, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contribution FROM member_contributions GROUP BY member_id;
SELECT member_id, profit_amount FROM member_contributions INNER JOIN profit_distribution ON member_contributions.member_id = profit_distribution.member_id;
SELECT * FROM member_contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM member_contributions
SELECT member_id, contribution_amount FROM member_contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC
SELECT member_name, member_contact FROM members WHERE member_status='Active'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_contributions FROM member_contributions
SELECT AVG(profit_amount) AS avg_profit FROM profit_distribution
SELECT member_id, contribution_amount, contribution_date FROM member_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 100 ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC;
SELECT member_name, member_contact FROM members WHERE member_status = 'Active' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT member_id, profit_amount FROM profit_distribution WHERE profit_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY profit_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM member_contributions JOIN profit_distribution ON member_contributions.member_id = profit_distribution.member_id WHERE contribution_amount > profit_amount;
SELECT member_id, CONCAT(member_name, ' - ', member_contact) AS member_info FROM members WHERE member_status = 'Inactive';
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT member_name, contribution FROM members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT member_name, contribution FROM members ORDER BY contribution DESC;
SELECT profit_id, amount, recipient FROM distributions WHERE profit_id = 200;
SELECT member_id, member_name, contribution FROM members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT profits.profit_id, transactions.transaction_date, distributions.recipient FROM profits INNER JOIN transactions ON profits.transaction_id = transactions.transaction_id INNER JOIN distributions ON profits.profit_id = distributions.profit_id;
SELECT member_name, SUM(amount) AS total_contribution FROM members JOIN transactions ON members.member_id = transactions.member_id GROUP BY member_name;

SELECT distributions.recipient, SUM(amount) AS total_distribution FROM distributions JOIN profits ON distributions.profit_id = profits.profit_id GROUP BY distributions.recipient HAVING total_distribution > 5000 ORDER BY total_distribution DESC;
SELECT * FROM member_contributions;
SELECT member_name, contribution_amount FROM member_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 500;
SELECT distribution_date, profit_amount FROM profits_distribution ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT id, member_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM member_payments WHERE payment_amount < 200;
SELECT expense_amount, expense_description FROM expenses_tracking WHERE expense_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM member_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000 ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT member_name, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contribution FROM member_contributions GROUP BY member_name HAVING total_contribution > 5000 ORDER BY total_contribution DESC;

SELECT m.member_name, p.profit_amount, ps.profit_share FROM member_contributions m JOIN profits_distribution p ON m.id = p.id JOIN profit_sharing ps ON m.id = ps.member_id WHERE p.distribution_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY p.profit_amount DESC, ps.profit_share ASC;
SELECT * FROM member_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;

SELECT e.expense_description, e.expense_amount, e.expense_date, p.payment_amount, p.payment_date FROM expenses_tracking e LEFT JOIN member_payments p ON e.id = p.id WHERE e.expense_amount > p.payment_amount OR p.payment_amount IS NULL ORDER BY e.expense_date ASC,p.payment_date DESC;
